channel.title: s4mahato on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in s4mahato on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Shilpa Mahato
item.description: Shilpa is a MSc Physics student in the Department of Physics and Astronomy at the University of Waterloo. She completed her Bachelor of Technology in Engineering Physics from Indian Institute of Technology Dhanbad. She is working on Quantum Simulations Project under Dr. Rajibul’s supervision.
